name: Suburban Basketball
description:
1.0 Available Now for Windows

Suburban Basketball is a new game where you play as John Basketball, and explore BASKETBALL CITY, this new game will FLOOR YOU with its realistic physics, etc. Cutting edge technology has led to the ultimate basketball simulator, in this game which provides THOUSANDS of hours of basketball gameplay, across a series of objectives over the course of a few days in BASKETBALL CITY.  As JOHN BASKETBALL you will meet and converse with many of basketball cities inhabitants and interact with its citizens while rising the ranks and becoming BOSS. Good luck!

 

What is it

This is a full conversion mod for FreeDoom running in GZDoom. All equip-able items ("weapons") are custom made with original photography.  Original music. Dozens of lines of original voice acting. A built from the ground up "journal" feature which updates as you progress. I'm pulling textures and sprites from Doom 2, Hexen, Strife, HacX, TekWar, and Blood (a lot of them are intentionally distorted/discolored). I'm also using some audio from Hexen, HacX as well as NPC audio from GTA San Andreas/Vice City. There are 7 or so missions across one map, as well as hidden collectible items. Any NPC can be interacted with and there are 11 characters that you can engage in dialogue with. Complex NPC AI. Three possible endings.  I might put out a mac version soon.

Contributions by others

Misha Kurita contributed two songs, ambient sounds,  sound effects, and voice acting.

Colin Sakamoto contributed photography for in-game items.

I'm packaging a few free tools with this game. They include:

FreeDoom Phase 2 https://freedoom.github.io/

Two minimods:

Hellscape Navigator by m8f https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=61643

NC-Keypad by Blue Shadow https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=37&t=30068

Menu font by Kappes Burr  https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=56299

How to run: 1. Unzip the file. 2. Double click "Suburban Basketball"
